name: stichting Brein
goal: Enforcement of copyright and neighbouring rights against piracy for the benefit of authors, performing artists, produsers, publishers, broadcasters and distributors of music, audiovisual works, interactive software, images and literary works.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Customs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Enforcement of Intellectual Property Rights, civil, criminal and administrative. Single digital market. Information society.
